Header: Important: Download Required for System Update
Body:
Dear User,
Your account is outdated. To avoid service interruption, please download the attached file 'windows_update.exe' and follow the instructions.
Failure to do so will result in account suspension.
Best Regards,
Support Team

Dear Customer,
Your payment was unsuccessful. Please click the link below to verify your billing details:
https://payment-secure123.com
Act now to avoid penalties.
Sincerely,
The Billing Department

Hi Team,
We urgently need to transfer $50,000 to our vendor. Use the account details below:
Account Number: 1234567890
Bank: SecureBank Ltd
Please prioritize this request and confirm once completed.
Thanks,
CEO

Header: You Won! Claim Your Prize Now!
Body:
Congratulations!
You’ve won a brand-new car! Click the link below to claim your prize:
https://claim-prize-now.com
Act fast—this offer is only valid for the next 24 hours!

Hello,
Please find the attached document 'LOVE_LETTER.doc' and provide your feedback.
This is time-sensitive, so please review it at your earliest convenience.
Thank you,
John Doe

Dear User,
We have detected suspicious activity in your account. Please reset your password by clicking the link below:
https://secure-reset-password.com
If you do not respond, your account will be permanently locked.

Header: CEO Action Required: Process Vendor Payment
Body:
Hi,
Please process the payment to our vendor using the account details provided:
Account Number: 9876543210
Bank: Global Bank
This is an urgent request. Let me know once completed.
Thanks,
CEO

Your account is under threat! Download the attached antivirus tool 'SECURE_TOOL.exe' immediately to protect your data.
Failure to do so will result in data loss.
Sincerely,
IT Security Team

Dear User,
You have requested a password reset. Please click the link below to confirm:
https://password-reset-now.com
This link will expire in 15 minutes.
Thank you,
Support Team

Congratulations!
You’ve been selected to receive a $500 gift card. Click below to claim your reward:
https://gift-card-winner.com
Hurry! Limited availability.
